available_translations.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

child_taxons.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

children.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

document_collections.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

facet_groups.description: Prototype-stage metadata tagging tree roots for this content item. A content item my belong to many facet groups without having any specific facet_values links.

facet_values.description: Prototype-stage metadata tagging values for this content item, a content item can be linked to many facet values from varying facet groups.

finder.description: The finder for this specialist document.

lead_organisations.description: DEPRECATED: A subset of organisations that should be emphasised in relation to this content item. All organisations specified here should also be part of the organisations array.

level_one_taxons.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

mainstream_browse_pages.description: Powers the /browse section of the site. These are known as sections in some legacy apps.

meets_user_needs.description: The user needs this piece of content meets.

ordered_related_items.description: Related items, can be any page on GOV.UK. Mostly used for mainstream content to power the sidebar. Ordering of the links is determined by the editor in Content Tagger.

ordered_related_items_overrides.description: Related items, can be any page on GOV.UK. Overrides 'more like this' automatically generated links in the beta navigation.

original_primary_publishing_organisation.description: The organisation that published the original version of the page. Corresponds to the first of the 'Lead organisations' in Whitehall for the first edition, and is empty for all other publishing applications.

part_of_step_navs.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

policies.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

policy_areas.description: A largely deprecated tag currently only used to power email alerts.

primary_publishing_organisation.description: The primary organisation for this document

related_to_step_navs.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

secondary_to_step_navs.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

suggested_ordered_related_items.description: New A/B test suggestions for related items. Used for displaying related content on most pages, except for step-by-step and fatality notices. Links and their ordering are determined by the machine learning algorithms included in this A/B test.

taxons.description: Prototype-stage taxonomy label for this content item

topic_taxonomy_taxons.description: Link type automatically added by Publishing API

topics.description: Powers the /topic section of the site. These are known as specialist sectors in some legacy apps.

phase.description: The service design phase of this content item - https://www.gov.uk/service-manual/phases

absolute_path.description: A path only. Query string and/or fragment are not allowed.

analytics_identifier.description: A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.

asset_link_list.description: An ordered list of asset links

body_html_and_govspeak.description: The main content provided as HTML with the govspeak markdown it's rendered from

temporary_update_type.description: Indicates that the user should choose a new update type on the next save.

first_published_at.description: The date the content was first published.  Automatically determined by the publishing-api, unless overridden by the publishing application.

api_url.description: DEPRECATED: api_path should be used instead of api_url. This is due to values of api_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

web_url.description: DEPRECATED: base_path should be used instead of web_url. This is due to values of web_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

api_url.description: DEPRECATED: api_path should be used instead of api_url. This is due to values of api_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

web_url.description: DEPRECATED: base_path should be used instead of web_url. This is due to values of web_url being tied to an environment which can cause problems when data is synced between environments. In time this field will be removed by the Publishing Platform team.

max_cache_time.description: The maximum length of time the content should be cached, in seconds

public_updated_at.description: When the content was last significantly changed (a major update). Shown to users.  Automatically determined by the publishing-api, unless overridden by the publishing application.

publishing_app_name.description: The application that published this item.

publishing_request_id.description: A unique identifier used to track publishing requests to rendered content

publishing_scheduled_at.description: When this content was last scheduled for publishing. Determined by the publishing intent sent by the publishing API.

rendering_app.description: The application that renders this item.

scheduled_publishing_delay_seconds.description: The delay between the most recent scheduled and actual publishing times. Determined by the content store based on the publishing intent.
